p: An on-chain automation loop for your blockchain automation needs. Perfect for on-chain game loops.
Your contract should inherit from AutoLoopCompatible.sol(see example)

l: Register AutoLoop compatible contract through AutoLoop Dashboard

p: An AutoLoop worker you can run to earn profits and
Create a .env file with RPC URL & wallet private key (see .env-example)
Set contract addresses in controller config ( controller.config.json)
Register wallet as AutoLoop worker (via registrar)
Run the AutoLoop worker with controller privileges
